author: Feed post
text: Razorpay has been in high-growth mode since day one. With a young, mobile-first India, businesses of every shape and size are expanding across the country and beyond. From India‚Äôs largest corporations to a small store in Lucknow selling kurtis, coffee estates in Coorg shipping some of the best beans nationwide, to grandmothers selling homemade papads from Kallidakurichi, the sheer diversity of entrepreneurs going all-in is incredible. Being front-row to this slow-brewing transformation is an experience in itself. And behind so many of these stories, Razorpay is the engine powering their payments.
